mapper.select: SELECT A.SCIENTIFIC_NAME AS scientificName, A.LOCAL_NAME AS localName, A.SALES_NAME AS salesName, A.PLACE_ORIGIN AS placeOrigin, A.PLACE_CURRENT AS placeCurrent, A.SOURCE AS source, A.CHILD_TYPE AS childType, A.FEED_TYPE AS feedType, A.FEED_PERIOD AS feedPeriod FROM pd_classestree_mat AS A WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}
